page.title: 05POLLOK HOUSE SURVEY GLASGOW
page.content: 3rd June l985 - St. Convals Primary Surveyed l00 people who visited Pollok House. { { {Type of Visitor: -}Male-45, Fem-55 {Age of Visitor:- }l-l5=2, l6-30=29, 3l-45=l6, 46-60=28, 6l-75=24, 76-90=l. {Mode of Transport:- }Car-49, foot-29, bus-ll,coach-6,rail-3,taxi-2. {Place of Origin:-}Glasgow-53,Scotland -24, USA-l4, London-6, S Africa-2, Canada-l {Reason for visit:-} Friend-55, Tourist Information-23, Television-8, Press-7, Work There-7. {Preference:-}Pollok House-48, Burrell Collection-35, l7 liked both equally.
